reviews.review: Please don't let this take away as much of your life as I have.
this game remind me of what cum taste like

Great game if you like first person shooters with strategy involved. But doesn't change anything major just little updates because its pretty balanced how it is, no over powered gun unless your just better. The anti cheat in this game sucks its the worst but there is still a lot of active players so in the lower ranks i haven't been seeing anything to crazy except for the rare times. The game is meant for u to play with friends solo queuing is so bad because lots of people don't have mics or just don't know how to make good call outs.

its a good game but many cheaters

Bah ca coule de source hein CS GO a deja largement fait ses preuves auparavant pourquoi se mettre a VALORANT ? Plus serieusement je suis toujours aussi content de jouer au jeu que ce soit seul en me lancant des defis un peu nul contre les bots (merci la console d'ailleurs) ou en faisant des mini jeux ou des parties avec des amis ! En gros tres bon jeu meme si S'IL VOUS PLAIT FAITES QUELQUE CHOSE POUR LA MP5SD JE L'AIME MAIS CES DEGATS *HORRIBLES* 1PV de plus par munition serait parfait :D
